text: Did the security sent to Card request endpoints change? All my cards are coming up empty because the signature is not matching

Hey :wave:

Anyone successfully implemented something that would work like Server-side tracking in HubSpot CMS to track Pageviews and CTA clicks in order to send them to Facebook API. This is necessary since ios 14.5. The Facebook pixel is not enough anymore since most IOs won't opt-in to cookies and tracking.

The problem is that, in HubSpot, Pageviews and CTA click are also tracked with cookies on the front-end and we don't have access to the server of our websites for server-side tracking...

<@UD53A9UUR> <@U7SL518D6> <@U2H3TT8F2> I would appreciate your thoughts on this one.

<@U01E6Q1958A>, hi there !
I'm just finding myself in the same spot and I was wondering if you found a solution regarding the registration of a contact to an event ?

Also, you mention you get a 202 when registering but on my end I still can't figure out how to pass the contact Id into the request... any chance you may help ?

Thanks !

Hello <@U02JH23B6T1> - Unfortunately there's no way to see or retrieve the marketing event subscriptions for a contact. 

We were equally shocked when HubSpot confirmed that to us. 

We had to maintain a separate HubDB to fetch data and then display it on the frontend. 

Like you can associate a Custom Object to a contact, and that would show up on both your Custom Object Instance card - and inside the Contact Details Card - there’s no visual reference for a Marketing Event and associated/registered subscribers. 

I wish there was.
Yes, we did get a 202 response.

That's very useful feedback, it'll save me quite some time !
Thank you very much, really feels like a half-baked feature, what a shame.

Hey three Louis. HubSpot analytics are done using a first party cookie, so they’re not affected.

Facebook cookies I’m uncertain about. The official Facebook integration may be able to assist with this since it integrates with our reporting/analytics functionality. <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/marketing/social-media/facebook>
blog list rss feed does not include meta description, is there anyway to add it in the rss.xml ? , Thanks!
